content:
objective reality of moral val-
ues than the objective reality of the physical world. Actions like rape, torture,
and  child  abuse  aren’t  just  socially  unacceptable  behavior;  they’re  moral
abominations. Some things, at least, are really wrong. Similarly, love, equality,
and self-sacrifice are really good. But if objective values cannot exist without
God, and objective values do exist, then it follows logically and inescapably
that God exists.
